    Simulate ACM0019 monitoring data

    simulate_acm0019_dataset.Rd

    Generates tidy monitoring datasets consistent with ACM0019 nitric acid projects, including production, emission factors, and auxiliary energy use.

    simulate_acm0019_dataset(periods = 6, observations_per_period = 30, seed = NULL)

    Arguments

    periods

    Number of monitoring periods to simulate.

    observations_per_period

    Number of observations per period.

    seed

    Optional seed for reproducibility.

    Value

    A tibble containing simulated monitoring observations.

    Examples

    simulate_acm0019_dataset(periods = 3, observations_per_period = 5, seed = 42)
#> # A tibble: 15 × 10
#>    period production_tonnes baseline_ef_kg_per_tonne project_ef_kg_per_tonne
#>    <fct>              <dbl>                    <dbl>                   <dbl>
#>  1 P1                 1665.                     9.75                   1.29 
#>  2 P1                 1432.                     9.39                   1.34 
#>  3 P1                 1544.                     8.44                   1.41 
#>  4 P1                 1576.                     8.52                   1.08 
#>  5 P1                 1549.                    10.0                    1.30 
#>  6 P2                 1487.                     9.38                   0.857
#>  7 P2                 1681.                     8.79                   1.04 
#>  8 P2                 1489.                     9.43                   1.03 
#>  9 P2                 1742.                     9.99                   0.717
#> 10 P2                 1492.                    10.3                    1.21 
#> 11 P3                 1657.                     9.33                   1.24 
#> 12 P3                 1774.                     9.40                   1.13 
#> 13 P3                 1333.                     8.79                   1.35 
#> 14 P3                 1467.                     9.68                   1.05 
#> 15 P3                 1484.                     9.24                   0.926
#> # ℹ 6 more variables: electricity_mwh <dbl>, grid_ef_t_per_mwh <dbl>,
